channel.title: Hate
channel.description:
I don't understand why people hate each other.
When people get angry at me I think it is funny. People who hate me get angry at me lots and provide me lots of laughs. How could anyone hate anyone who provides such amusement?
Abuse is quite good as well. Abuse is just a battle of creativity. Sure you can tell someone they are a cunt. But I bet you wouldn't think to tell them that they have gwackamolie for brains. Therefore I think abusing others should be a sport. :)
Please share your thoughts.
P.s If you just post to say that I am not funny here is a tip: 'I think you are funny when you abuse me.'

I am Tatemo.

item.title: Hate
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Adam Adam
item.description:
@Mod_Adam wrote:

[quote=“Tatemo, post:49, topic:312050”][quote author=The Reaper X link=topic=408491.msg3019148#msg3019148 date=1257463861]

Why do you like to post gay topics like these?

this.

Honestly, what’s the point? Provide something of interest.
[/quote]It’s as interesting as you want it to be. You don’t have to participate if you don’t want to.

So very true.

[quote author=Adam link=topic=408491.msg3019151#msg3019151 date=1257464103]

Why do you like to post gay topics like these?

this.

Honestly, what’s the point? Provide something of interest.
[/quote]It’s as interesting as you want it to be. You don’t have to participate if you don’t want to.

Exactly why I’m not. /out

No one ever wanted you here in the first place?[/quote]
Who are you? Honestly.

Read full topic

item.title: Hate
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“Tatemo, post:43, topic:312050”]You have another reason that does not end up at amusement?[/quote]To discuss topics reasonably, the essence of a forum. You’re interpretation of amusement is a little over-emphasized. Maybe it’s amusing to you, but you don’t have to repetitively announce it to make you’re point.

item.title: Hate
item.dc:creator: @P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut `Lewk_
item.description:
@P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut wrote:

[quote=“Telenim, post:10, topic:312050”][quote author=`Aaron link=topic=408491.msg3015346#msg3015346 date=1257133288]

Why do you like to post gay topics like these?

[/quote][quote author=Explisionist link=topic=408491.msg3015348#msg3015348 date=1257133442]
Quoting someone with out your input is stupid.

Most people get warned for doing it… So why do it if you know this?
[/quote][quote author=`Aaron link=topic=408491.msg3015351#msg3015351 date=1257133544]
Because i want to know why do you like to post gay topics like these? it’s Moparscape.
[/quote][quote author=Chassy13 link=topic=408491.msg3015352#msg3015352 date=1257133613]
If you really can’t reply with something productive, please don’t reply at all. If it gets out of hand I will clean the topic.
[/quote]I produced something productive![/quote]
THIS LOLOL

[quote=“The Soul, post:27, topic:312050”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=408491.msg3016014#msg3016014 date=1257196198]
But people from MITB know they arent retards…
[/quote]

They don’t think too high of Fat Cookies actually.[/quote]
Wow, how couldn’t they? Fat cookies is awesome?
